title: Smite kogmaw new meta?
body:
5 attacks per second.

new rageblade doesnt have the ranged champ nerf on its devo effect.

New jungle item does 3% max hp on hit.

Kogmaw w does 2% before ap.

5 * 5 = 25% per second

Add in rageblade passive and it becomes 32.5% per second counting the half auto.


Thats two items (not counting the stuff to reach 5 as)  to kill someone in 3 seconds flat with nothing but auto attacks.

God forbid you throw a wits end or something in there and i dunno a hextech to keep you alive.

replies.body: i was thinking about this kog with the new rage blade at 5 attack speed is getting another 2.5 attacks of per second so its really 7.5 attack speed
I already calculated for that in my original post.

25% per second = 4 seconds to kill someone. in your perfect world you know who can do that in equal to or less than the same amount of time?

absolutely anyone, because rate of damage isnt guaranteed when its not true damage AND when it doesnt take into account the factor of, i dunno, the level disparity, the resistances, your team, the circumstances. even with the boot enchantments gone theres still a lot of movespeed in the game and ways to neutralise any supposed glass cannon these days

"new meta" briiiiing in the cancer pimps and players

Funfact.

Thats 4 seconds from one source of damage.

It doesnt magically make his ad do no damage, or his q, or his ult, or his items.

So lets take for instance i dunno a kogmaw auto attacking a nautilus with 4k hp and 100 armor.

He would have to do 8000 damage in ad to kill him without last whisper or armor pen.

lets say our mystical kog has 500 ad 100% crit chance and an infinity edge, considering the amount of pure ad items that would take he also has like 1.0 attack speed.

And considering his w halves ad damage it wont increase his damage any further with that.

So lets count the seconds it would take to kill that nautilus with nothing but auto attacks an attack speed of 1 and 500 ad and an IE with 100% crit chance.

8000 / (500 * 2.5) = 6.4 seconds.

Do you know whats faster than 6.4 seconds? 4 seconds.

But then again that damage is halved by the armor so its actually 8 seconds.

BUT WAIT I LIED, only half of the damage is mitigated by the armor, so in reality its 6 seconds.

God forbid kog maw land like one or two q's and hell he can throw an ult in aswell.

God forbid you also take into consideration the rageblade double on hit proc reducing the raw damage time to 3 seconds since it ups the percent health per second to 33%.

Like shit you can throw a duskblade in the build, get 10 auto attacks (15 on hit effects) off so 66% of their health bar then have that damage applied in the form of a 16.5% health duskblade explosion reducing them to a total of 17.5% health remaining.

Or you can take it even further and add both a duskblade and a botrk, deal 61.5% of their health bar in botrk damage in those 2 seconds, along with the 66% from his w and bloodrazer, and then if they still arent dead after that from armor or something the duskblade will pop them.

Thats 2 seconds.

And you can make it even crazier with other items too.
